title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-contained Llama-2, CodeLlama, Mistral, Gemma, etc. runner with a REST/CLI API and model library.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama API (Node & browsers).

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; pip-installable wrapper around the REST API.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package letting you use Ollama models as LLMs, embedders, or tool callers.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich ChatGPT-style web UI for any Ollama model; runs in Docker.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with Android compatibility and reactive extensions.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI that wraps Ollama with conversation history and markdown rendering.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot replacement.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + LangChain + FAISS for PDF Q&A.

title: ollama-tools
summary: Experimental repo showing how to expose Python functions as tools to Ollama models via OpenAI-style JSON schemas.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix derivation to build & run Ollama reproducibly on Linux/macOS.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection.

title: ollama-direnv
summary: Direnv plugin that auto-downloads the requested Ollama binary when entering a project folder.

title: ollama-chatbot-ui
summary: Lightweight React chatbot component that talks to Ollama over REST, published on npm.

title: ollama-node
summary: Third-party TypeScript-native client for Ollama with additional retry & timeout policies.

title: ollama-py
summary: Community Python wrapper offering synchronous and asyncio interfaces plus helpers for bulk embedding.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem for Ollama with Rails-friendly generators and background-job examples.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that brings any Ollama model into a server with slash commands.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that adds a /ollama slash command for private or channel Q&A.

title: ollama-on-termux
summary: Community-maintained Termux package letting you run Ollama CPU inference on Android phones.
